an5.294-302:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato nigaṇṭho … muṇḍasāvako … jaṭilako … paribbājako … māgaṇḍiko … tedaṇḍiko … āruddhako … gotamako … devadhammiko yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5.294-302:4.3: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti … pe … surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
an5.294-302:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato devadhammiko yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
